plot: A journey of hope, faith and love, that reminds us of our own power to overcome adversity and obstacles. One woman rises above challenges, becoming changed in a way that transforms her life.
title: Blue Butterflies
plot_es: A journey of hope, faith and love, that reminds us of our own power to overcome adversity and obstacles. One woman rises above challenges, becoming changed in a way that transforms her life.
